attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why should we as students be forced to pay out a large amount of money. beening at university is similar to being at school or college we didnt have to pay then why now! 
Financial support is difficult for some, and taking the loans out and having to pay back tuition fees dont help as it adds up. also its kind of unfair that we have to pay so much to be educated

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
